title: Trader Bets Swell on Trump-Backed Fed, Data Stoking US Rate Cuts
description: In the US futures market, demand is building for short-term curve structures linked to the Secured Overnight Financing Rate, which closely tracks perceived...
content:
(Bloomberg) Traders are piling into bets that a new Federal Reserve chair and the release of delayed economic data this month will support Donald Trumps calls for lower interest rates.
